blurb: Motivated employee with experience in customer service, administrative operations, hospitality and sales open to opportunities in Berlin or remote positions. Bilingual in English and Russian.

jobs.title: Front Office Specialist
tasks: Ensured a warm and inviting guest experience through friendly greetings and attentive service, effectively communicating in fluent English, native Russian, and basic German.
Upheld high standards of customer service, resolving guest inquiries and issues promptly.
Orchestrated seamless food and beverage service, at the bar and in the kitchen.
Handled transactions efficiently as a cashier, ensuring a smooth payment experience for guests.
Proactively maintained cleanliness, organisation and decoration of guest areas, contributing to a welcoming environment.
Managed guest check-ins and reservations efficiently.
Organized documents and disposed of outdated materials, ensuring confidentiality and compliance.
Handled administrative duties including assigning parking spots, requesting restocking of supplies, and organizing common areas.

jobs.title: Client Services Representative
tasks: Supported advertisers on a leading social media platform.
Acted as a key liaison between the company and clients, ensuring prompt issue resolution.
Recognised for exceptional customer service and team success.
Consistently exceeded targets, earned praise for excellent customer service, and significantly contributed to team success.

jobs.title: Digital Artist
tasks: Cultivated an Instagram following of 7,000+ through original digital artwork.
Fulfilled follower requests and commissions.
Demonstrated strong customer engagement and project management skills.

jobs.title: Administrative Assistant
tasks: Managed office operations in a fast-paced newsroom.
Collaborated with accounting, design, marketing, conferences, and editorial departments.

jobs.title: Temporary Secretary
tasks: Supported various companies with operational and project tasks.
Managed administrative duties for smooth business operations.

jobs.title: Customer Support Professional
tasks: Led educational sales and supported language learners.

jobs.title: Sales Professional
tasks: Managed sales, provided customer service, and recommended products.
Achieved sales targets and assisted customers with fashion choices.

jobs.title: Assistant Archivist
jobs.company: Russian State Archive of Ancient Acts, OPJS Telegraph
tasks: Managed, digitized, and organized corporate and state archive documents.

education.institution: Russian State University for the Humanities
education.subject: Documentation and Archival Studies
